fixed_skill.desc: Increase party's critical rate by 6.5%/6.8%/7.2%. For every 10% of the user's critical rate, increase party's critical rate by 1.1%/1.2%/1.2% more, up to 4.4%/4.6%/4.8%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Revolution

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Attack by 7.9% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Mataru III

innate_skill.desc: Restores 3.5% of max HP at the start of each turn.
innate_skill.name: Regenerate III

innate_skill.desc: Decrease Speed by 12. Increase HP by 29%.
innate_skill.name: Ironclad Resolve III

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 21.2%. At the start of battle, increase the Attack of the ally with the highest Attack by 10% and their critical rate by 4% for 3 turns (prioritize Assassins and Sweepers).
passive_skill.name: Heavenly King's Eyes

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 21.2%. At the start of battle, increase the Attack of the ally with the highest Attack by 12% and their critical rate by 5% for 3 turns (prioritize Assassins and Sweepers).
passive_skill.name: Heavenly King's Eyes I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 21.2%. At the start of battle, increase the Attack of the ally with the highest Attack by 14% and their critical rate by 6% for 3 turns (prioritize Assassins and Sweepers).
passive_skill.name: Heavenly King's Eyes II

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
